targets.query:
from(bucket: "${signalk}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "temperature")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["environment"] == "outside")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["id"] == "${mmsi}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.source =~ /^${sources:regex}/)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value -273.15}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "outside")

from(bucket: "${signalk}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "temperature")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "minimum")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["environment"] == "forecast")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["forecast"] == "today")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["id"] == "${mmsi}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.source =~ /^${sources:regex}/)  
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value -273.15}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "min")

from(bucket: "${signalk}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "temperature")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "maximum")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["environment"] == "forecast")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["forecast"] == "today")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value -273.15}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "max")

from(bucket: "${signalk}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "weather")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "clouds" )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["id"] == "${mmsi}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.source =~ /^${sources:regex}/)  
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value * 100.0}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "clouds")

from(bucket: "${signalk}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "weather")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "uvindex" )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["id"] == "${mmsi}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.source =~ /^${sources:regex}/)  
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "uvindex")

from(bucket:"${signalk}")
  |> range(start:  -6h, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "pressure")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["environment"] == "outside")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["id"] == "${mmsi}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.source =~ /^${sources:regex}/)  
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value / 100.0 }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "Pressure")

from(bucket: "${signalk}")
  |> range(start: -3h, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "wind")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "speed")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["environment"] == "true")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["id"] == "${mmsi}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.source =~ /^${sources:regex}/)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value * 1.94384}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "windspeed")

from(bucket: "signalk_metrics")
	|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
	|> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "wind")
	|> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "speed" or r["_field"] == "direction")
	|> filter(fn: (r) => r["environment"] == "true")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.id == "${mmsi}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.source =~ /^${sources:regex}/)	
	|> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: 
	      if r._field == "speed" 
        then ((r._value / 0.514))
	      else ((r._value*180.0/3.1415)+360.0)%360.0 
	  }))
	|> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
	|> filter(fn: (r) => exists r["direction"] and exists r["speed"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: first, column: "direction", createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${signalk}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "temperature")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["environment"] == "inside")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["id"] == "${mmsi}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.source =~ /^${sources:regex}/)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value -273.15}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "inside")

from(bucket: "${signalk}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "temperature")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["environment"] == "fridge")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["id"] == "${mmsi}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.source =~ /^${sources:regex}/)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value -273.15}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "fridge")

from(bucket: "${signalk}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "temperature")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["environment"] == "freezer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["id"] == "${mmsi}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.source =~ /^${sources:regex}/)  
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value -273.15}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "freezer")

from(bucket: "${signalk}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "temperature")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["environment"] == "water")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["id"] == "${mmsi}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.source =~ /^${sources:regex}/)  
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value -273.15}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "water")

from(bucket: "${signalk}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "batteries")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "voltage")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["id"] == "${mmsi}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> yield(name: "voltage")

from(bucket: "${signalk}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "description" and r["type"] == "batteries")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "min" or r["_field"] == "max")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> drop (columns: ["_start", "_stop", "_time", "type"])
  |> yield(name: "max")

from(bucket: "${telegraf}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "temp")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "temp")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host == "${skhost}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${telegraf}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "temp")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "temp")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${fhost}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${telegraf}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host =~ /^(${hosts})/ and r.cpu == "cpu-total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r._field, set: [
        "usage_user", 
        "usage_system"
    ]))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: true)
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> rename(columns: {
        usage_user: "user",
        usage_system: "system"
    })

list.definition:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "description")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "signalk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["label"] == "bucket")
  |> last()
list.name: signalk

list.definition:
import "date"
import "strings"

from(bucket: "${signalk}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "time")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "sunrise")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.id == "${mmsi}")
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with sunrise: string(v: date.add(d: ${timezone}, to: time(v: uint(v: r._value)))) }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: strings.substring(start: 11, end: strings.strlen(v: r.sunrise)-11, v: r.sunrise) }))
list.label: Sunrise
list.name: sunrise

list.definition:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement != "description")
  |> keep(columns: ["source"])
  |> distinct(column: "source")
list.label: Sources
list.name: sources
